subject: Soccer
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Season-ticket prices for the Red Bulls at their new stadium will range from $272 to $585, and single-game tickets will cost $20 to $45. The $585 season-ticket price will be for midfield seats at the 25,000-seat Red Bull Arena being built in Harrison, N.J.
